# grove init validation tests
# Tests init command help output and subcommand routing

## Help output

exec grove init --help
stdout 'Initialize grove'
stdout 'Usage:'
stdout 'Available Commands:'
stdout 'new'
stdout 'convert'
! stderr .

# No subcommand shows help
exec grove init
stdout 'Usage:'
! stderr .
